item.description:
Quickie Balances for Your Subtle Energies
with Judith Poole

This will be a participatory demonstration intended to involve all in
attendance. You will learn a number of energetic corrections that address
common imbalances. These can improve your own well-being, and may be just
the thing to share with a client to help them maintain the changes that you
are working on together. The material covered will be based primarily on the
work of Donna Eden and, time permitting, may include an integrating
technique developed by Stephanie Eldringhoff.

Our meetings begin with a potluck lunch, and a chance to meet everyone in the group.
Please let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.

$10 meeting fee.
item.how_to_find_us: I will come to the door to welcome you!
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies March Meetup
